name: Stoney Inc.
description:
YOU'RE HIRED! And as our new employee at Stoney Inc., we expect your work ethic to be rock hard! Follow protocol as you traverse the office, but don't mind the --

Well no need to worry about that! You're replacement has arrived right on time. Don't let your hard work go to waste.  All of your self sacrifices will be rewarded by the corporation! But please do keep in mind all the resources you use. Waste management is important. Thank you, and good luck new employee!

Controls

  • A, D - move Left and Right
  • Space - Jump
  • Hit the spikes to turn into stone!

Programs Used

  • Godot
  • Gimp
  • Aseprite
  • Jsfxr

Credits

  • elevators in vietnam by Anttis Instrumentals
  • Edit Undo BRK by AEnigma Fonts
